pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 7, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Serene Highness Prince Albert II of Monaco.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

2 p.m.      The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Gatineau, Quebec

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend and deliver remarks at the Canada’s Building Trades Unions Legislative Conference.

Ballroom
Hilton Hotel Lac Leamy
3 rue de Casino

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to RSVP with Don Arseneault, darseneault@buildingtrades.ca, 613-558-0653.
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 5 p.m. and present themselves at Registration desk in ballroom foyer.
